Launch your music career with

GIG N JAM Manager

JOIN NOW!

Gig N JAM for Musicians

Reach more fans, promote your work and find gigs!

Get found. Get noticed

Promote yourself to fans, promoters and labels with a professional profile - biography, discography, photos and all about you in one place.

Let your music be heard

Upload your music. Let the fans discover your music. Get rated by your fans

Network Oportunities

Join a band or find band members. Connect with promoters and venue owners for music opportunities.

Private Events

Gig N Jam fans look for live music for their corporate and private events. Don't miss this opportunity to get new fans too.

Find & Apply to Gigs

Use Gig-n-Jam to boost your career in four easy steps

Find a Gig

Apply Online

Add Gig To Schedule

Share & Invite Fans

Promote your tours

Gig-n-Jam manager can help you to reach fans and sell more tickets!

Add to your schedule

Create an event and add to your tour schedule. Sync shows across the web. Fans will be able to view your tour schedule and learn more about your gig or concert.

Invite Fans To Track You

Post your GignJam tracker on your social media. Trackers are notified when you announce a new concert date and when you are performing in their area so they never miss your show.

Add a trailer video

Introduce your unique sound and give fans a preview of your performance or tour. Create hype with live show clips or simply send a personalized video message to your fans. Encourage fans to track and see you live!

Gig-n-Jam is helping musicians around the world to boost their careers
